Title: Police launch search for missing 38-year-old FRSC officer, daughter
Summary: Police launch search for missing 38-year-old FRSC officer, daughter . Funmilayo Oluwamayokun is a female officer of the FRSC and her daughter . Ogun State Police Command has launched a search for the missing woman .

Title: UNIABUJA appoints Prof. Fawehinmi as new VC
Summary: The Governing Council of the University of Abuja has approved the appointment of Professor Hakeem Babatunde Fawehinmi as the institution’s substantive Vice-Chancellor . Fawehim is currently serving as the vice-chancellor of the Nigerian British University, which was recently renamed Yakubu Gowon University

Title: Taraba Assembly begins debate on residents registration bill
Summary: The Taraba State House of Assembly has commenced deliberations on the Taraba Residents Registration Bill, 2025 . The proposed law seeks to create a unified database of all residents in the state . Sponsored by the former speaker, Peter Abel Diah .

Title: Why we arrested  Regina Daniels’ brother — FCT Police
Summary: Samuel Ojeogwu, also known as Sammy West, is the brother of Nollywood actress Regina Daniels . The Federal Capital Territory (FCT) Command of the Nigeria Police Force has provided an account of the circumstances that led to the arrest and arraignment .

Title: Christian youths demand fairness in political appointments
Summary: The Youth Wing of the Christian Association of Nigeria (YOWICAN) has called on the Federal Government to ensure fairness and inclusivity in political appointments . YOWICAN said perceived imbalances could deepen national tensions .

Title: Davido, Omah Lay, Burna Boy, others nominated for Grammy award 2026 [Full List]
Summary: Kendrick Lamar leads the 2026 Grammy nominations with nine nods . Davido, Omah Lay, Burna Boy, others nominated for Grammy award 2026 [Full List]

Title: Alleged Genocide: Trump’s intervention, prayer answered not invasion – Christian Council
Summary: The CCN said the anticipated intervention by the American government should not be seen as a welcome development to assist Nigeria in dealing with the intractable problem of insecurity .

Title: US revokes 80,000 visas of Nigerians, other foreign nationals
Summary: The United States Department of State has revoked the visas of more than 80,000 individuals, including Nigerians and other foreign nationals . The move is part of a sweeping immigration enforcement initiative under former President Donald Trump .

Title: Alleged Genocide: Tinubu meets Sultan of Sokoto in Aso Villa
Summary: President Bola Tinubu met with the Sultan of Sokoto, His Eminence Muhammad Sa'adu Abubakar, on Friday at the Presidential Villa in Abuja .

Title: Benue Okada riders ground Gboko, protest murder of four members
Summary: The protesters sang war songs and made bonfires in strategic spots around the town . The protesters came out as early as 6 am as they rode in convoys in very long convoys .
